definitions: a person whose job is to assess the monetary value of something

examples.text: her property is worth up to $40 million, according to appraisers
it's always a good idea to have your antiques certified by a recognized appraiser

shortDefinitions: person who assesses monetary value of something

definitions: a person who carries out a formal assessment of an employee's performance

examples.text: an appraiser should create a conducive environment where the subordinate will feel more comfortable

shortDefinitions: person who carries out formal assessment of employee's performance
